name: Grid Attack
overview: This is my version of the C64 oldie "Crossfire". Your task is to survive as long as possible in the arena which is surrounded by enemies who shoot at you. You can move the ship with the Joystick in Port2 as long as you stay inside the arena. Pressing the fire button and moving the joystick in a direction will fire a bullet in that direction, assuming you haven't run out of ammo yet.
